intro: Maxillaria pleiantha, commonly known as the showy maxillaria, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its vibrant, often fragrant flowers that come in a range of colors including white, yellow, and pink. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees or other surfaces in its natural habitat. Its leaves are broad and革质, providing structural support and aiding in water retention. Maxillaria pleiantha thrives in warm, humid environments with bright, indirect light.
